color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, controls color of track and thumb, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，控制 track 和 thumb 的颜色，默认为 theme.primaryColor

hiddenInputProps.description: Props passed down to the hidden input
hiddenInputProps.description_zh: 向下传递到隐藏输入的 props

inverted.description: Determines whether track value representation should be inverted, false by default
inverted.description_zh: 确定是否应反转轨道值表示，默认情况下为 false

label.description: Function to generate label or any react node to render instead, set to null to disable label
label.description_zh: 生成标签的函数或任何要渲染的 react 节点，设置为 null 以禁用标签

labelAlwaysOn.description: Determines whether the label should be visible when the slider is not being dragged or hovered, false by default
labelAlwaysOn.description_zh: 确定当滑块未被拖动或悬停时标签是否可见，默认情况下为 false

labelTransitionProps.description: Props passed down to the Transition component, { transition: 'fade', duration: 0 } by default
labelTransitionProps.description_zh: 默认传递给 Transition 组件的 props { transition： 'fade'， duration： 0 }

name.description: Hidden input name, use with uncontrolled component
name.description_zh: 隐藏的输入名称，与非受控组件一起使用

onChangeEnd.description: Called when user stops dragging slider or changes value with arrows
onChangeEnd.description_zh: 当用户停止拖动滑块或更改箭头值时调用

precision.description: Number of significant digits after the decimal point

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, 'xl' by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，'xl'

scale.description: A transformation function to change the scale of the slider
scale.description_zh: 用于更改滑块比例的变换函数

showLabelOnHover.description: Determines whether the label should be displayed when the slider is hovered, true by default
showLabelOnHover.description_zh: 确定将鼠标悬停在滑块上时是否应显示标签，默认情况下为 true

size.description: Controls size of the track, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制轨道的大小，默认为 'md'

step.description: Number by which value will be incremented/decremented with thumb drag and arrows, 1 by default
step.description_zh: 通过拇指拖动和箭头将值递增/递减的数字，默认为 1

thumbChildren.description_zh: 在 thumb 中呈现的内容

thumbSize.description: Thumb width and height, by default value is computed based on size prop
thumbSize.description_zh: Thumb 宽度和高度，默认情况下，该值是根据 size 属性计算的
